scope_of_work.title: Phase 1: Data Ingestion & Performance Monitoring
tasks: Connect to Google Ads API using Python SDK and extract key metrics (e.g., impressions, conversions, cost).
Connect to CallTrackingMetrics (CTM) API and extract call-related data (duration, caller ID, source, etc.).
Clean and normalize data from both sources and design an appropriate schema for BigQuery storage.
Set up scheduled data fetching using Cloud Functions (daily or hourly based on feasibility).
Create basic monitoring rules such as: campaigns with 0 impressions, CTR drop > 50%, cost increase > threshold, low daily conversions.
Trigger alerts via email or Slack (can be plain text or structured JSON) using a defined message format.
Ensure modular, well-documented Python code and provide deployment instructions for GCP.
Provide basic operational documentation covering setup, configuration, and rule extension.

out_of_scope.title: The following are excluded from this project.
tasks: UI or dashboard development.
Data ingestion from sources other than Google Ads or CTM.
Long-term monitoring and maintenance beyond handover.
Advanced anomaly detection using ML or forecasting models.
Integration with internal CRM or ticketing tools.
Any production-grade alert delivery pipelines (email servers, Slack bots beyond basic setup).

dependencies.title: Phase 1: Data Ingestion & Monitoring Setup
tasks: Access to Google Ads Manager account with developer token and credentials.
CallTrackingMetrics API credentials and endpoint access.
Google Cloud project with BigQuery and Cloud Functions enabled.
Slack webhook or SMTP credentials for alerts.
Predefined rules or KPIs for monitoring (or agreement on a minimal rule set).

timeline.description: Connect to Google Ads and CTM APIs, validate credentials, and define BigQuery schema.
Set up data ingestion jobs, validate data storage in BigQuery, and deploy scheduled functions.
Implement rule-based logic and configure Slack/email alert delivery with summaries.
Test all pipelines and alerts, refine thresholds, and finalize deployment documentation.

proposals.title: Full-Funnel Data Infrastructure & Campaign Optimization
proposals.client_name: Dukier Cool products, for Cool pets üêæ

scope_of_work.title: Phase 0: GA4 Event Hygiene & Audit
tasks: Conduct a thorough review of the current GA4 implementation.
Identify issues related to data accuracy, tracking configuration, and event setup.
Provide a detailed report outlining findings, including areas for improvement.
Address issues identified during the audit.
Implement recommended fixes, including correcting event tracking and parameters.
Configure enhanced measurement features for the custom event of 15 from the business point of view.
Standardize naming conventions for events and parameters.
Implement or update key events and conversions to ensure comprehensive tracking across the site.
Validate data accuracy using DebugView and Realtime reports.
Document tracking schema for future reference and alignment across teams.

scope_of_work.title: Phase 1: Server-Side Enrichment & Data Pipeline
tasks: Deploy a server-side container using Google Tag Manager hosted on a secure server. Please assess the expected event volume and setup costs. We request your team's assistance in configuring the custom domain and cloud infrastructure.
Set up server endpoints for GA4, Meta Conversion API (CAPI), and Google Ads Conversion Tracking.
Ensure accurate mapping of client-side GA4 events to their server-side equivalents. This includes key events such as purchase, add_to_cart, view_item, and begin_checkout, among others.
Implement secure hashed identifiers (email, phone) alongside client_id, fbp, and fbc to support cross-platform attribution for GA4, Meta Ads, and Google Ads.

Ensure all event payloads follow the required schema for GA4, Google Ads and Meta CAPI, including custom parameters.(if raw product cost and other params need to check based on api data however that will not refelct on the brower api call
Use GA4 DebugView and Meta Events Manager to test, validate, and troubleshoot server-side event delivery.
Create and maintain a comprehensive technical configuration document covering both GA4 server-side setup and Meta Conversion API implementation.

scope_of_work.title: Phase 2: Data Ingestion & Reporting
tasks: Set up automated data export from GA4 to BigQuery.
Use Google Ads native BigQuery connector to store data in bigquery (via Google Cloud).
Establish performance monitoring and alerting mechanisms for key metrics.
Use Meta Ads third party BigQuery connector to store data in bigquery (via ETL tool).
Implement ad-level reporting by BigQuery data with Meta Ads and Google Ads datasets.
We will integrate daily order data using the Shopify API, fetched via an Apps Script in Google Sheets.

Create 2-3 stakeholder-specific dashboards, each with a focused view: Marketing View: Spend, ROAS by Campaign & Channel , Product View: Revenue by SKU or Category, Finance View: Weekly POAS trends, Cost vs. Revenue, Use BigQuery connector in Looker Studio to avoid manual updates.
Segment reporting views Apply filters instead of building multiple pages/tabs to reduce processing load
Develop interactive and user-friendly dashboards in Looker Studio tailored for different stakeholders (marketing, product, finance).

out_of_scope.title: The following are excluded from this project.
tasks: Data pipeline construction for first/third-party data sources.
Creation of reports or dashboards not specified in this SOW.
Building any production-grade machine learning models.
Integration or optimization of other systems or tools not related to GA4.
We will not support on server side beyond shopify limited api which possible directly on custom tag, variable or client.
Any activities not explicitly mentioned in this scope.
Any delays caused by dependencies or access-related issues may impact the overall project timeline.
We are limiting the reporting scope to basic KPIs and standard reports based on available data source tables. Custom queries or data blending will not be included.

dependencies.title: Phase 0: GA4 Event Hygiene & Audit
tasks: Access to existing GA4 properties (with edit permissions)
Access to GTM containers (Web and App, if applicable)
Datalayer availability and consistency across website/app (requires your dev team to implemented)
Access to live staging/dev environments (if applicable for testing)
Website code access or shopify access

dependencies.title: Phase 1: Server-Side Enrichment & Data Pipeline
tasks: Custom domain setup for server-side GTM (e.g., tag.domain.com with DNS and SSL)
Cloud environment (GCP/AWS) provisioned with necessary access/roles
Access to Shopify Admin and API credentials
Availability of hashed user identifiers (email, phone) in datalayer or any varaible
List of enriched attributes (e.g., product cost, logistics cost, customer segments)
Legal/Privacy team input for GDPR/CCPA compliance

dependencies.title: Phase 2: Data Ingestion & Reporting
tasks: Google Cloud project access for BigQuery setup
Google Ads and Meta Ads account access with data export permissions
BigQuery billing account configured and active
Access to Looker Studio with BigQuery connector permissions
Daily order data schema and Shopify API access
Pre-approved KPIs and stakeholder reporting requirements
Client-side report validation point of contact

timeline.description: Establish a solid foundation by ensuring GA4 is properly configured and capturing all relevant user interactions.
Enhance data quality and flexibility by shifting to server-side tracking and including profitability metrics.
Build a scalable and insightful analytics infrastructure through automated data pipelines and advanced dashboards.
